1S.setup.Title: Set up integration with 1C
1S.setup.assistedSetup.Title: Set up with the help of a partner
1S.setup.selfSetup.Title: Configure it yourself
1S.setup.assistedSetup.Instruction: You only need to submit a request — we will do the rest.
1S.setup.assistedSetup.Description: The manager will first clarify the specifics of integration with your 1C configuration and calculate the cost of services.
1S.setup.Form.Phone.Label: Phone number for contacting the manager
1S.setup.Form.Email.Label: E-mail for sending materials after communicating with the manager
1S.setup.selfSetup.Instruction: To configure the integration yourself, download {instructionLink} and click «Next step», to proceed to the next step and accept the offer. All registries will be automatically uploaded to the platform — you will see the accruals and payments of residents on this page.
1S.setup.assistedSetup.connected.Title: We will contact you within 24 hours
1S.setup.assistedSetup.connected.Text: As soon as everything is set up, payments from residents and accruals will appear on this page
1S.setup.selfSetup.connected.Title: Configure integration with 1C via {instruction Link}
1S.setup.assistedSetup.onCompleted.Text: In the meantime, sign the offer
